SEARCH
Package model

Class Threshold

java.lang.Object
model.Threshold
public class Threshold extends Object
Represents a goal threshold consisting of a name and the number of points required to reach that goal.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Yuliia Iliienko

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Determines whether this Thresholds object is equal to another object. Two thresholds are equal if both the goal name and required points match.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to compare with
      Returns:
      true if both objects represent the same threshold, false otherwise
